text: Tạ Thái Học (born on 17 July 1988 in Ninh Thuan, Vietnam) is a Vietnamese footballer who plays as a striker for Bình Phước in V.League 2. ==Career== Despite playing as a forward, Thái Học has thus far only scored a couple goals in his 6 years as a footballer. This is part due to various injuries he has had. Nonetheless coaches have referred to Thái Học as a hardworking and dedicated player. In July 2016 Thái Học suffered a serious injury to his right projected to keep him out for 8-12 months. This was the third such injury to happen to Thái Học in his career. ==Personal life== Thái Học is married to Đặng Thị Hoài Thanh, whom he wed in a private ceremony. After scoring a goal in a cup game against Viettel in 2016 Thái Học celebrated by tucking the ball under his shirt in homage to his pregnant wife. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Vietnamese footballers Category:V.League 1 players Category:Hoang Anh Gia Lai F.C. players Category:Association football forwards
title: Tạ Thái Học
